author: sky.cactus
content: We are speculating about a bright future, that may not be immediate.

author: sky.cactus
content: Someone submitted a manual PR to mark an EIP as stagnant.  The EIP hadn't been touched for a year or two so I merged.  Should I not have?

author: poojaranjan
content: If it is for over a year, it seems like a very good candidate for "Withdrawn". I suppose, it can be moved to  "Withdrawn" by an EIP editor.

author: gcolvin
content: It hardly even make grammatical sense for anyone but an author to withdraw their own proposal..
